content.question: The function <math alttext="h"><semantics><mi>h</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses equals 5 times 3 to the power of open parentheses negative x divided by 2 close parentheses end exponent"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>·</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="h open parentheses 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mn>1</mn></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator 1 over denominator square root of 15 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mn>1</mn><msqrt><mn>15</mn></msqrt></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 over denominator square root of 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="fraction numerator 5 over denominator square root of 3 end fraction"><semantics><mfrac><mn>5</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
